title: Savage Hearts
description: My life has been turned upside down.King, the man I grew up thinking was this town's savior and a friend, turned out to be the devil in disguise.A man with his own agenda, plotting my demise, and trying to turn the guys against me all along.Gabe, the devil who wore his horns proudly for the world to see, has become the wild card.He’s hot and cold and up to no good.He’s using me against his enemy.I’m now questioning everything I thought to be true, but there’s one thing I know for certain.I’m done being a pawn in this war.Savage Hearts is book two of the Reapers of Havoc Series and must be read in order. The heroine has multiple hot-as-hell love interests.Please be advised this series contains dark content such as graphic sex scenes, harsh language, violence, kidnapping among other dark content. This series is recommended for those 18 years or older. If dark content triggers you then this series is not for you. Otherwise, happy reading.
author: Ashlee M. Edmonds
